gpt-4o-mini.description: A cheaper verison of GPT-4o. This is the free model of ChatGPT.

gpt-4o.description: This is the main model of ChatGPT's subscriptions.

gpt-4.1.description: Described as the flagship GPT model for complex tasks, this model peforms strongly.

gpt-4.1-mini.description: A weaker, but still strong version of GPT 4.1, with reduced costs.

gpt-4.1-nano.description: The cheapest verison of GPT 4.1, which makes it the weakest version of GPT 4.1.

o3.description: The strongest model that OpenAI has to offer (as of 2025), with it exchanging speed for high accuracy and reasoning.
